Example of Evaluating Osteomyelitis Based on a History of a Single Active Initial Episode
Situation
:  The Veteran was diagnosed with osteomyelitis in service with discharging sinus.  At separation from service the osteomyelitis was inactive with no involucrum or sequestrum.  There is no evidence of recurrence.
Result
:  As there has been no recurrence of active osteomyelitis following the initial episode in service, the historical evaluation of 20 percent is not for application.  The requirements for a 20-percent evaluation based on activity are not met either.
Coded Conclusion
:
